• VXLIB Function Reference
Thresholding

OpenVX Function Description

  • Thresholds an input image and produces an output Boolean image.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d3/d1e/group__group__vision__function__threshold.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_thresholdBinary_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_thresholdRange_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
